Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: ingombe ni sisolo sirukuakgwa mudala tsingombe tsiruo tsidaru eya sisuungu eya nende eya siafrika tsingombe tsiosi etsirukwa tsiri nende bulayi busabi
Translation: ngombe ni mnyama anayefugwa kwa boma ngombe wako wawiliya kizungu ya gredi nay kiafrika ngombe wote wanaofugwa wana uzuri wake

Original: ingombe niirukibwa yinya ibe nende oburindi bulayi okhoyere obe nende lwairo luakana nende tsingombe tsia orukire tsiosi tsinyikhana tsibe nende abuundu we tsikona esiduoli
Translation: ngombe akifugwa anastahili kuwa na ulinzi mzuri unafaa uwe na mahali pa kuchunga ngombe panapotoshana na ngombe ulio fuga wote wanafaa wawe na mahali wanapolala zizini

Original: burimundu amanyire mbari ingombe ireranga amabeere inyama nende amapesa kanyala khukhonya
Translation: kila mtu anajua kuwa ngombe huleta maziwa myama na pesa zinaweza kusaidia

Original: tsingombe tsikera baseebe khurula ebialo bindi nibeetsa khurukendera khulola tsingombe abakeni abo barulanga mu bialo bia are nga buganda tanzania nende ruanda
Translation: ngombe hufanya watalii kutoka nchi zingine wakija kututembelea kuona ngombe wageni hao hutoka nchi za mbali kama uganda tanzania na rwanda

Original: ingombe obuukhanga itsuri noyiyira khubwaairo
Translation: ngombe hawa huleta mbolea zamadi yao huokotwa yakiwekwa pamoja kutengeneza mbolea na kila mtu anajua uzuri wa mbolea ngombe unaamuka asubuhi na unapeleka malishoni

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: olanyola tsingombe tsikabukhane
Translation: ngombe ni mnyama yule ambaye tunafuga nyumbani kwetu ngombe ni mnyama mzuri sana utapata kuwa ngombe wametofautiana

Original: khuri nende tsingombe tsia igiredi nende etsia kienyeji
Translation: tuko na ngombe wa gredi ambao na wa kienyeji

Original: etsingombe tsiruberesianga amabeere nende einyama khandi kata ingombe iruberesianga mangond
Translation: ngombe hutupa maziwa na nyama tena ngombe hutupa pesa

Original: olanyola abandu bangi bajama einyama eya ingombe
Translation: utakuta watu wengi wanapenda nyama ya ngombe

Original: kata kario olanyola abandu bari nende tsimbeka tsikabukhane etsia bakhera khuria khu ingombe
Translation: hata hivyo utakuta watu wakiwa na sehemu tofauti ambazo wanapenda kukula kwa ngombe

Original: abandi bakhera khusamba ingombe mpaka yuume nibamala bairia inyama eyo inyala khumenya khu bikha birambi lukari
Translation: wengine wanapenda kuchoma ngombe hadi ikauke wakimaliza wanakula nyama hiyo huweza kuishi kwa muda mrefu sana

Original: khandi ingombe iruberesianga amabeere malayi mabeere ako kanyala khukobua biuma ni kamala kakasibua khungira ikabukhane
Translation: tena ngombe hutupa maziwa mazuri maziwa hayo yanaweza pelekwa viwandani kisha yakatengenezwe kwa njia tofauti

Original: kario kata mabeere akakasibuanga kaba nga busie omundu naakusia amabeere ako alanyola mapesa mangi lukari
Translation: kuna maziwa ambayo hutengenezwa na kuwa kama unga mtu akiuza maziwa hayo atapata pesa mingi sana

Original: omundu ari nende tsingombe etsio anyala khunyola amangond
Translation: tuna ngombe ambao husaidia watu kulima ngombe hao ni ndume na wanajua kulima sana hata kuna wale ambao husaidia kubeba vitu nzito mtu akiwa na ngombe hawa anaweza pata pesa

Original: khandi tsingombe tsinyala khururerera eimbolera indayi mundu naari nende ingombe anyala khunyola imbolera eya khuraka ebiakhuria biaye niyakharaka ebiakhuria ebio
Translation: tena ngombe wanaweza kutuletea mbolea nzuri mtu akiwa na ngombe anaweza pata mbolea ya kupandia vyakula vyake akipanda vyakula hivy

Original: olumarachi ni sindu sia mundu ahoere alomelome na esie nende ifamilia yange
Translation: kimarachi ni kitu ambacho mtu anapaswa kuongea na mimi na familia yangu

Original: na elira lia babuange lijulikana kama onyango na lira lia mamange lijulikana kama ruth na esie mumera nangunga ouma nesiye ndajama hulomaloma olumarachi sana
Translation: na jina la babangu linajulikana kama onyango na jina la mamangu linajulikana kama ruth na mimi kwa jina naitwa ouma name napenda kuongea kimarachi sana

Original: ata nende ifamilia yange yajama hulomaloma olumarachi
Translation: hata familia yangu inapenda kuzungumza kimarachi

Original: alafu mzee wange yajama huruka aina ya thisolo thinendi thizungukananga kama ingombe imbusi likondi nende tsingokho kwa wingi
Translation: hata mzee wangu yuapenda kufuga aina ya wanyama wanaozunguka kama vile ngombe mbuzi kondoo pamoja na kuku kwa wingi

Original: alafu thisolo thinendi nithiahamala huhula anyolanga biashara thinyingi sana
Translation: pia wanyama hawa wakishakua yeye hupata biashara nyingi sana

Original: vandu vamwithulangaho sana mbu venya huruka thingoho thiya igredi
Translation: watu hujaa kwake sana ati wanataka kufuga kuku wa gredi

Original: mapesa ka tsingoho thiya igredi thirerangamo thishilingi thinyingi sana

Original: thishilingi ethio thijulikananga kama mahumi mia moja nende sindu
Translation: pesa hizo hujulikana kama elfu kumi mia na zaidi

Original: yajama hukusia husiro sia butula avandu vaajama humuthiaho humukulaho ethingokho thingombekila aina nende makondi mangi sana
Translation: anapenda kuuza soko ya butula ambapo watu hupenda kumwendea kununua kwake kuku ngombe kila aina na kondoo wengi sana

Original: sianyala huhuvolera ni mzee unendi ni mundu unyala huruka vulisindu
Translation: ninachoweza kukuambia ni mzee huyu ni mtu anayeweza kufuga kila kitu

Original: omanyirekho nanyola mundu ulia ulomaloma olumarachi mweresie eshima thinyingi

Original: inyanga ndala hualiyo nende ijophu nende haveve

Original: ijophu yaliikonere asi wa musala mani hulano yali yahapumuzika vilayi injushi yalula eria ni ingira mumolu ka injofu eyo niichaka hurula mavanga mumolu kario haasie harula eria nihanyola injofu iliranga nihalorera injofu huruma sana nihathia mumolu huinia inzushi iria
Translation: ndovu alikwa amelala chini ya mti na sasa alikwa anapumzika vizuri nyuki alitoka kule na wakaingia mapuani mwa ndovu huyo hadi akaanza kutoa damu mwenzake alitoka kule akampata ndovu analia akamwonea huruma sana akaenda mapuani kumtoloea yule nyuki

Original: injofu yafurahiya sana niimwa shukurani inyingi sana
Translation: ndovu alifurahia sana na kumpea shukrani nyingi sana

Original: hadithi inendi yahabwera awo
Translation: hadithi hii imeishia hapo

Original: siruke siange ni ingombe
Translation: mfugo wangu ni ngombe

Original: ingombe ni sindu silayi lukari
Translation: ngombe ni kitu ambacho watu wanapenda kwa manaa ngombe ana faida mingi sana kwa watu watu wanampenda kwa maana wanajua kile wanachokipata kutoka kwake ngombe ni kitu mzuri sana

Original: nibilayi khube nende tsingombe
Translation: kusema kweli ngombe nikitu kinachoweza kukusaidia mahali pagumu sana manufaa yake ni kama umekwama mahali pagumu unaweza muuza na umalize shughuli zak

Original: khandi sikera niimbola mbari ingombe ni siruko silayi khubera mbu onyala khukusia mabeere khandi ewe mwene onyala khunywa noonyola bulamu bulayi kata onyala khubula isukari munyumba nookusia mabeere ako nookula
Translation: tena kinachofanya niseme ngombe ni mfugo mzuri ni kwa sababu unaweza uza maziwa tena wewe mwenyewe unaweza kunywa na uwe na afya bora hata unaweza kosa sukari kwa nyumba na unauza maziwa hayo na unanunua

Original: ni bilayi orisie ingombe yao bilayi khubera niwinya khukusia onyola inganga ingombe ni sindu silayi lukari ikhonya
Translation: ukweli tuwe watu wakushughulikia ngombe kila wakati tena tumpee maji ukifuga ngombe wa gredi anafaa ale mabingobingo hadi apate maziwa mingi tena mzuri yale ambayo ukinywa unahisi utamu wake ni vyema ulishe ngombe wako vizuri kwa sababu ukitaka kumuuza unapata faida ngombe ni kitu nzuri sana anasaidia

Original: tsinjugu
Translation: njugu

Original: khurerera kukhu

Translation: ngombe anafaida zake faida hizo ni kama ngombe hutupa nyama ambayo watu huuza buchani hadi ngombe pia hutupa maziwa pia hutupa mbolea tunayoweka kwenye mahindi yetu

Original: olumbuku ludoto engombe siiria po
Translation: gugu changa ngombe hali kamwe

Original: chigwena nichiola huloba chigwena

Original: owamakhumbo nakenda nafwarire ebilaro anyala khusamba ayi masira sina kano kashirire abachesi olumbuku

Original: omusiani owa makhumbo niyesinga ari nende indalo iria naringa amira sa amare
Translation: mvulana mwenye miguu kombo akioga ako na shamba ambayo akiangalia anameza tu mate

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: mbukula bikha bino khubola mbari ingombe bi sindu silayai khubera ingombe noikula niisiri ndidi olaba nooikhusia mwika mulala olaba ofaule khunyola tsisende tsisabi

Original: obulwaye bwa korona buhorere malayi hushira mabi

Original: obulwaye buno buakhola malayi kama bindu biriba biekesia bandu husaba mahono buri siha nende hukira bandu balekhale aambi

Original: obulwaye vuwa korona vyahonya avana varia vajama huihala mudala vafurahia nde huihala mudala nde vandi vanyola tsinda nde hutsia hudeha
Translation: ugonjwa wa korona ulisaidia wale watoto wanaopenda kukaa nyumbani wakafurahia kukaa nyumbani na wengine wakapata mimba wakaenda kuoleka

Original: vua kira avana vandi vasomera mutivi mana niveurira mno
Translation: ulifanya watoto wengine wakasoma kutumia runinga na wakajiskia vizuri sana

Original: ngahuakaluha musikuli ikalenda ya chenjewa nende hurupungusiria thinyanga thiya huva msikuli

Original: ingokho
Translation: kuku

Original: ingokho ni sireke silayi lukari ireranga mabuyu inyama nende ebindu bingi bulai bwa ingokho ni khurera mabuyu nende khualula mabuyu ako niyaalula tsimwinyi ni tsimwinyi etsio tsiba tsingokho khandi buri ingokho khasiijonganga khualula

Original: inyanga ndala khuaba nende ingokho yalangwangwa mbari jojo ingokho eyo yareeranga mabuyu mani basaba muruke tsingokho engwe muesi

Translation: kuku hata mgeni akija kwa boma mnaweza kumchinjia mgeni huyo akala tena kuku pia anaweza fanya mtu akawa tajiri sana

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: ingombe ni siruke silayi esiruke sino siberesianga abaandu inyama nende ebiindu bindi

Translation: ingombe wa gradi ana na kazi mingi tena ana kazi mingi kwa sababu hula nyasi mingi na tena anafaa kula vizuri

Original: esie ndevulwa muvamarachi
Translation: mimi ni mzawa wa marachi

Original: hurula omowarano mulukongo lwa vukat

Original: vevusi vange vosi kwanthia mberi

Original: olukoko wefu ano nyasaye niye waruwa khaandi yaruwa nga ilomaloma yolumarachi

Original: nomanomanga olumarachi olo nende vevusi vosi

Original: esie kata nindula huisomero nindahakaluha mudala nomanomanga olumarachi
Translation: mimi hata nikitoka shuleni nikirudi nyumbani huwa nazungumza kimarachi

Original: kata mama wange alomalomanga olumarachi
Translation: hata mama yangu huzungumza kimarachi

Original: esie kata mama wanje nanduma huduka nzithanga thimbiro
Translation: mimi hata mama yangu anitumapo dukani mimi huenda mbio

Original: mulukongo lwefu luno ihida ivlahowo ohuva sa vana nivathia mwisomero ende sapatu ni mli muisomero
Translation: kijiji petu hapa hamna shida ila wanafunzi huenda shuleni na champali

Original: novola vari vana vathie nde vilaro vieisomero ende thisoksi vukati navo lano vaurira vari muthie ende vitukutuku
Translation: ukisema kuwa wanafunzi waende na viatu na soksi bukati nao wanasikia ati muende na champali

Original: lano kata muisomero yefwe ino ni ye tsishida kata vana sivaurira da
Translation: kwa hivyo shule hii yetu ni ya shida wanafunzi hawasikii

Original: nivavola vino navo vahola vino
Translation: wakisema hiki wao wanafanya vile

Original: eyo sa niihida iri muisomero yefu ino husava sa ewe kama mzee wefu novolaho sindu vandu valaurira hosa lano nako sa mulusungo lwa haviri
Translation: hiyo ni shida iliyo shuleni humu na tunaomba wewe kama mzee wetu ukisema kitu watu watasikia kwa hivyo ni hayo tu kwa lugha ya pili

Original: esie inono yange ni nafoyo na mama wange ni susana babuange ni mufofoyo omangirecho
Translation: mimi ukoo wangu ni nafoyo na mama yangu ni susana babangu ni mfofoyo

Original: kata esie dari dakorwa inono yange kata dari chire muisomero mwalimu yandeva vari mwesi mwamanya chinono chienywe

Original: vana vandi vavola vari vamanya nasi mwalimu ngayandeva vari yewe wamanya inono yawo ndamureva vari inono nisina mwalimu yaborera vari yewe kata nokora niwenya vuhonyi nivahureva vari muri bantu sina wolavola vari sina

Original: lano mwalimu yaborera vari muchie mulule burek

Original: ngandari nithia ingo mwalimu yamberesia habarua ngobere bebusi vange

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: ingombe ni isolo indayi khumundu mundu yenyekhana ashughulikire ingombe inyole oluwa ikona abundu andayi abaandu bajama khukurikha ingombe ameera nga akefu ingombe yefu yajama khunywa amatsi malafu ni khandi niindayi khumundu

Translation: ngombe anapenda kukula vitu kama nyasi mabingobingo mbegu ya viazi vitamu ili unapo kama upate maziwa maziwa humletea mtu pesa na husaidia mtu akiwa na mtoto mdogo awe na afya bora

Original: aleetha khubabukula
Translation: atakuja kuwachukua

Original: solumarachi no lukuwa lwa bakukhu befwe kata efwe khwakharula mlwibulo olo nano fwesi nga khwenyola mbu khulusunganga nano kata nende lwiblo lwa sai nalwo lwadonga husungwa kata ngefwe khurula mulwivulo luo husunga olumarachi ni bulala burio kata nende befwe beene ni viene viryo

Original: sndakhaba mwandiki wefwe justine adhiambo
Translation: nimekwa mwandishi wetu justine adhiambo

Original: abamenyi ba kenya basiange esinyenya mukhole ni muruke tsingombe mubungi nimukhola murio mulaba muekhonyere lukari mu bulamu buenyu bwa imberi ni mulabola mbari ndabakhonya ni mwakhakanyirenge abaana benu

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: ingombe niisolo ya khuruka mudala inyala khurera inyama khandi inyala khurera mabere ingombe yoosi inyala khunyua matsi onyala khuiremera lusi nibilayi ingombe ninyola khuria bilayi

Translation: kukukumbusha ngombe anaweza kusimamishwa ama auzwe anaweza kusimamishwa kwa arusi ngombe ni kitu kizuri anaweza leta maziwa vizuri sana kila mtu aweze kulinda ngombe wake

Original: ingombe ni indayi lukari khubera iri nende tsifaida
Translation: ngombe ni nzuri sana kwa sababu ana faida

Original: ingokho

Original: ingombe

Original: ingombe

Original: bulayi bwa ingombe

Original: ingombe ni isolo ya bandu baruka mudala khuri nende tsingombr tsibiri eya mabeere nende eya inyama mundu ula owakhera khurima anyala yaruka eya yenya muene igombe iri nende birenge bine tsinjika nende ebindu bindi sirenge sia ingombe siri nende sirekei ingombe yosi iri nende mukhira

Original: ingombe niisolo ya khuruka mudala inyala khurera inyama khandi inyala khurera mabere ingombe yoosi inyala khunyua matsi onyala khuiremera lusi nibilayi ingombe ninyola khuria bilayi

Original: ingombe ni sindu silayi sinyala khukhonya mundu onyala khukusia ingombe wanyola amapesa kama tsielefu mia tsidaru mundu naari nende ingombe aikhorera bindu bilayi kama khuifura nende khuisirikha
Translation: ngombe ni kitu kizuri kinaweza kusaidia mtu unaweza kuuza ngombe ukapata pesa kama elfu mia tatu mtu akiwa na ngombe anamfanyia vitu vizuri kama kumpuliza na kumtibu

Original: khare nende ako ingombe inyala khurima indalo khandi onyala khurusiamo inyama inyama ya ingombe ni indayi lukari inyama eyo niindayi khu abandu
Translation: kando na hayo ngombe anaweza lima shamba tena unaweza toa nyama nyama ya ngombe ni nzuri sana nyama hiyo ni nzuri kwa watu

Original: khuitsurisia ingombe inyala khusinjibwa au ikusibwe inyala khusinjibwa mu arusi ingombe ni siindu silayi inyala khurera mabeere malayi lukari buri mundu anyale khurinda ingombe yaye
Translation: kukukumbusha ngombe anaweza kusimamishwa ama auzwe anaweza kusimamishwa kwa arusi ngombe ni kitu kizuri anaweza leta maziwa vizuri sana kila mtu aweze kulinda ngombe wake

Original: ingombe ni indayi lukari khubera iri nende tsifaida
Translation: ngombe ni nzuri sana kwa sababu ana faida

Original: ubulwaye bwa korona bwalera malayi khushira mabi

Original: kama tsifamilia tsiria tsiri nitsifwiirirwe nende abandu babu okhulondana nende obulwaye buno

Original: buli ifamilia yaanyolanga tsisabuni buli mundu mti mlala
Translation: kila familia ilipata sabuni moja kwa kila mtu kwa familia

Original: abandu bandi baberesibwa ebyakhulia
Translation: watu wengine walipewa vyakula

Original: mumera kange nangwa lydia akinyi ohurula vutula
Translation: kwa majina naitwa lydia akinyi kutoka butula

Original: nyanga huvavorera rifua ria musiani wefu

Original: yari inyanga ya musasava mwosi kwa mnane mtare kumi na ndala
Translation: ilikuwa siku ya alkhamisi mwezi wa nane tarehe kumi na moja

Original: omusiani wefu yakholanga ikasi nairobi
Translation: kakangu alikwa akifanya kazi nairobi

Original: yari amarire hukalukha mdala na handi akalukha nairobi
Translation: alikuwa asharudi nyumbani na tena akarudi nairobi

Original: yaendelea ohumenya nairobi kidogo endio
Translation: aliendelea kuishi nairobi kidogo hivyo

Original: efue huari mdala alafu aruo waruhubira isimu mbari huahakosia omusiani wefu

Original: sikhuavukuriramo ukweli da

Original: huanza hulondohesia amakhuwa khukhwanyola ukweli mbu yari afwire
Translation: tulianza kufuatilia maneno hayo ndio baadaye tukapata ukweli kuwa alikuwa amefariki

Original: huarira msiani wefu mpaka idakika yakhwari huthia humwenda nairobi ayari
Translation: tulilia kaka yetu mpaka dakika ya kwenda kumleta nairobi alipokuwa

Original: huari hwahamwenda ohurula nairobi huarira vivi sana nihurira mana nihurira lukali
Translation: tulipomleta kutoka nairobi tulilia vibaya sana tukalia na tukalia zaidi

Original: yekhala musasava mana ni husiha inyanga ya jumamosi
Translation: alikaa alkhamisi na tukazika jumamosi

Original: yarureha nende sivera ni hukorwa hulanyole yena msiani wefu undi kama oyo
Translation: alituacha na huzuni tukikosa kujua tutakapotoa ndugu yetu kama huyo

Original: huamala humusikha mana natsia mwikulu mwa nyasaye
Translation: tulimzika na akaenda mbinguni kwa mungu

Original: halano ni witsa mdala wefu hutulie sa bibi huri nende butehere buosi hubera huamala husikha musiani wefu mana yamala hutsia
Translation: hivyo ukija nyumbani tumetulia tu vibaya na huzuni wote kwa sababu tulimzika ndugu yetu na akaenda

Original: isaino huri nende mlembe kwa nyasaye
Translation: kwa sai tuna amani ya bwana

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: ingombe ni isolo ya mudala ingombe irukhonyanga khurima nende khunyola mabeere ingombe ibulao abandu bangi bakhanyakhane mubulamu buabu nori nende ingombe khasiwakhakosa amapesa musialo siefu sia kenya abasatsa babukulanga tsingombe nibastia khukhua abakhasi abaana befu barunganga mubisomero khululana nende ingombe
Translation: ngombe ni mnyama wa nyumbani ngombe hutusaidia kulima na kupata maziwa ngombe hangekuwepo watu wengi wangeangaika maishani mwao ukiwa na ngombe hauwezi kosa pesa katika nchi yetu ya kenya wanaume walikuwa wanachukua ngombe na wanaenda kupeleka mahari kwa wake wao watoto wetu hulipa karo kutokana na ngombe

Original: ingombe iruberesianga amaseero abaandu bakhanyakhane ingombe iumire mubulamu abakenya bakheera ingombe nga isuna nende huruwi mani khasiwakhakosa ingombe mumadala
Translation: ngombe hutupa ngozi watu wangeteseka ngombe hangekuwepo maishani wakenya wanapenda ngombe kama mbu na masikio hivyo hauwezi kosa ngombe kwa boma

Original: ingombe ibulao bakhasi boosi bakhanyakhanenge mubulamu buabu
Translation: ngombe hangekuwepo wanawake wote wangeteseka kwa maisha yao

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: khalano esie mbukula ebikha bino khubola mbari ingombe ni sindu silayi lukari niiri muridala ingombe ni siruke esiamenya mudala ni sikhonyanga mundu mu ebindi bisabi
Translation: kwa hivyo mimi nachukua muda huu kusema kuwa ngombe ni kitu kizuri sana akiwa nyumbani ngombe ni mfugo anayeishi nyumbani na humsaidia mtu kwa vitu vingi

Original: ingombe khandi irukhonyanga khu biidu nga khurima khandi tsingombe tsireranga ebiindu nga amabeere ingombe khandi yoosi khuirusie ebindu bino yiinyikhana irisibue ebiindu nga bunyasi lusi nende amatsi
Translation: ngombe tena hutusaidia kwa vitu kama kulima tena ngombe huleta vitu kama maziwa ngombe pia kabla atoe vitu hivi anastahili alishwe vitu kama nyasi mabingobingo na maji

Original: ingombe niiri mudala yewe obula buyendi kata budidi khubera ori nende obuyinda mu tsingombe khandi ingombe inyala yakhobua ebukhwe owa mukhasi yarula
Translation: wewe pia kama mtu unafaa kumlisha vitu kama maji ili apate nguvu ya kufanya kazi ngombe akiwa nyumbani wewe hauna wasiwasi hata kidogo kwa sababu uko na utajiri kwa ngombe tena ngombe anaweza pelekwa mahari pale msichana alipotoka

Original: kharani esiruo ni mbari khukule tsingombe khubekho ninatsio mudala kata noorenyarirwa weedinye sa okule ingombe obe ninayo mudala
Translation: kile kilicho ni kuwa tununue ngombe tuwe nao nyumbani hata usipowezewa jikaze tu ununue ngombe uwe naye kwa boma

Original: sikuli siefu silangwa dadira ndasijama sana huluo huvera sipafomanga vilai sana mumasomo

Original: sikuli sefu ni silai sana sai siri nende iparedi indai

Translation: shuleni kwetu kuna wanafunzi mia nne ishirini wasichana mia tatu alafu wavulana mia moja ishirini

Original: alafu valimu huriende valimu ehumi huehumi avo vakhasi ni varano alafu vasatsa vosi ni varano
Translation: pia tuna walimu kumi kwa hao kumi wanawake ni watano na vilevile wanaume

Original: sikuli siefu siri nde headmaster rira rilangwa hagai obuya alafu mudidi waye alangwa mbu patrick sidwaka
Translation: shule yetu ina mwalimu mkuu jina lake ni haggai obuya kisha naibu wake anaitwa patrick sidwaka

Original: valimu avo valichanga vindu kama vusuma nende ichai
Translation: walimu hao hula vitu kama ugali na chai

Original: valimu vali nende mudehi oubadeheranga nende khufulukira vana vusera
Translation: walimu huwa na mpishi anayewapikia na pia kukoroga uji wa watoto wa chekechea

Original: ndajama mukhasi oyo na khandi yajamwa na vangi
Translation: napenda bibi huyo na tena anapendwa na wengi

Original: obumesi
Translation: ulevi

Original: obumesi ni bubi
Translation: ulevi ni ubaya

Original: abandu banywetsanga ni bamesi bo lukano handi nibakhamera ni barasi muno
Translation: watu wanaokunywa ni walevi sana tena wakilewa hukuwa wachokozi sana

Original: sibaria mundu dawe
Translation: hawamwogopi mtu

Original: nikhamera muno shenyanga hurunga amatongolo ke sikuli kata nali mukholi we mirimo
Translation: akishalewa sana hawataki kulipa karo ya shule hata akiwa mfanyakazi

Original: abamesi ba malwa sibakhonyanga bakhasi nende baana da
Translation: walevi huwa hawasaidii mke na watoto wao

Original: mulekhe malwa karera bulware bukabukhane mumubili
Translation: wacheni pombe ikalete ungonjwa tofauti kwenye mwili

Original: abamesi benyanga busuma nende siriroinyeni nende ingokho
Translation: walevi hutaka ugali kwa mboga kama samaki na kuku

Original: bino biosi bilangwa sinulu nomba binulu
Translation: hizi zote zinaitwa kitoeo au vitoeo

Original: obulwaye bwa korona

Translation: ugonjwa wa korona ni ugonjwa mwingine usiojulikana

Original: buatsaka omwaka kwa elefu tsibiri nende makhumi kabiri omwosi nikuri okua khudaru itare yaba ekhumi nende tsidaru
Translation: ulikuja mwaka wa elfu mbili na ishirini mwezi wa tatu tarehe ilikuwa kumi na tatu

Original: bwalula musialo silangwa mbari china
Translation: ulitoka kwa nchi inaitwa china

Original: buola mu sialo sia tanzania buula buganda khubuula mukenya

Original: noonyala kheikikha khulondana nende amalako aka bakhongo ba bulamu ababoola
Translation: ukipata kujikinga kufwatana na sheria za wakuu wa afya walisema

Original: babola mbari khurie ebiakhuria bireera amani mumibiri kiefwe

Original: ni khandi khwedinye khufwala tsimaski nikhuri mubandu khulekhe khukhesania mikhono khwesabe mikhono khweeme vurambi bwa imita ndala nende bunusu are nende abaasiefwe nende khweesabe nikhurumikhira matsi kadonya
Translation: na tena tujikaze kuvaa barakoa tukiwa pamoja na watu tuwache kusalimiana kwa mikono tunawe mikono tusimame umbali wa mita moja na nusu tunapokuwa pamoja na wenzetu na tunawe kutumia maji yanayo tiririka

Original: abaandu bandi beekhonyeranga amatsi khumala bulware buno obwa korona lakini bwamalanga buira abaandu abangi
Translation: watu wengine walikuwa wanatumia maji kumaliza huu ugonjwa wa korona lakini ulimaliza ukawaua watu wengi

Original: buluare buno bwira muruki wa sialo sia tanzania oolangibwa mbari john pombe magufuli
Translation: huu ugonjwa ulimuua kiongozi wa nchi ya tanzania anayeitwa john pombe magufuli

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: ingombe niiri mudala yewe obula buyendi kata budidi khubera ori nende obuyinda mu tsingombe khandi ingombe inyala yakhobua ebukhwe owa mukhasi yarula
Translation: wewe pia kama mtu unafaa kumlisha vitu kama maji ili apate nguvu ya kufanya kazi ngombe akiwa nyumbani wewe hauna wasiwasi hata kidogo kwa sababu uko na utajiri kwa ngombe tena ngombe anaweza pelekwa mahari pale msichana alipotoka

Translation: kile kilicho ni kuwa tununue ngombe tuwe nao nyumbani hata usipowezewa jikaze tu ununue ngombe uwe naye kwa boma

Translation: watu wanapenda kuchinja ngombe siku ya sikukuu kwa sababu huwa siku nzuri kwa mtu ndio sababu mtu anampenda kuliko vitu vingine vingi hata watu wa zamani walikua wanapenda ngozi ya ngombe

Original: esie mumera nangwa sharon atieno omito
Translation: mimi kwa majina naitwa sharon atieno omito

Original: ndi nende miaka ehumi nende kidaru
Translation: nina miaka kumi na mitatu

Original: ndi mukilasi ya saba
Translation: niko katika darasa la saba

Original: esie ndajama sana lumarachi huvera ndevulwa vumarachi
Translation: mimi napenda sana kimarachi kwa sababu nilizaliwa kwa wamarachi

Original: esie hurula nyasaye nanonga nende hunda munda mwa mwivusi wange yari yamura nende lengo hulwa vuli mundu were uno yamura nende inomanoma yaye

Original: niri ifula efwe hunyola

Original: kata chindalo chiefwe chiri nende vyahulia vilai sana

Translation: wazee wamarachi walikula jivuhutumika kama madini hivyo hawajafariki kwa sababu mungu angali na wao

Original: esie ngalusiria were oluyari hunanga haandi ndi nende ifuraha sana huvera nasaye nuananga navola mbu esie ni mulayi kamili
Translation: mimi namrudishia mungu shukrani kwa kuniita na tena nina furaha sana kwa sababu mungu ndiye aliniita akisema mimi ni mzuri sana

Original: ndahurira vumarachi handi kata nifwa ndalasihwa vumarachi
Translation: nilikuzwa kwa wamarachi na hata nikifa nitazikwa kwa wamarachi

Original: kwani wenya huva mujaluo kata mama wao niyahulira muvajaluo na yesi ni mjaluo
Translation: kwani unataka kuwa mjaluo hata kama mamako alikuzwa kwa wajaluo na yeye pia ni mjaluo

Original: esie ndajama lumarachi vilai sana hadi ndaendelea hulomaloma miaka kiasi muvulamu vwange
Translation: mimi napenda kimarachi vizuri sana hadi nitaendelea kuzungumza miaka michache maishani mwangu

Original: esie mberesia luyari mwalimu alala nende vevusi vefwe vakera hualumanya sana
Translation: mimi nampa pongezi mwalimu pamoja na wazazi wetu waliofanya tukakijua sana

Original: ocholicholi ni khakesi
Translation: sungura mjanja ni mwerevu

Original: khare khare khwariioo nende ojolijoli imbusi nende ifisi imbusi ni indayi mubulamu bua abaandu khandi imbusi iruberesianga mabeere nende inyama ifisi ni khandu habi
Translation: hapo zamani za kale paliondokea sungura mjanja mbuzi na fisi mbuzi ni muhimu kwa maisha ya watu tena mbuzi hutupa maziwa na nyamafisi ni katu kabaya

Original: khalano ifisi yari yamenya nende ifisi bari betsa lukari imbusi yari itsire khuria bunyasi ni ifisi nayo yaba itsire khukonya biakhuria mwana wa imbusi yaba abayanga nende omwana wa ifisi mwana wa ifisi yakwa muriina ni mwana wa imbusi yatsaka khuringa ebindu biariimo bimemu biatsoma omwana wa ifisi yafwa
Translation: kwa hivyo fisi alikuwa anaishi na fisiwalikuwa marafiki sana mbuzi alikuwa ameenda kula nyasi na fisi naye alikuwa ameenda kutafuta chakulakimeme alikuwa anacheza na kikuto kikuto alianguka shimoni na kimeme akaanza kuangalia vitu vilikuwemo vikalivikamdunga kikuto akafa

Original: imbusi nende omwana wayo beerukha nibatsia imbusi yakutana nende siduyu siduyu riareba imbusi mbari wiirukhanga tsina niimbusi imuborera mbari iirukhanga khuluakhuba omwana waye yeerere omwana wa ifisi ojolijoli yaborera imbusi mbari yiitsa khumukhonya
Translation: mbuzi na kimeme wakakimbia wakaenda mbuzi alikutana na sungura sungura akauliza mbuzi eti unakimbia nini mbuzi akamweleza kuwa anakimbia kwa maana kimeme amemuua kikuto sungura mjanja akamwambia mbuzi kwamba atamsaidia

Original: ojolijoli khakhera imbusi nikhara mabeere muchupa alafu mabanga li khasoolatema khudira imbusi nikhamala khaboyakoosi muchupa ifisi yetsa tsimbiro ojoliojoli kheema imberi wa ifisi ni imuborera mba imbusi khumuriango eyo khaba
Translation: sungura mjanja alikama mbuzi kakaweka maziwa kwa chupa halafu damu pia kwa chupa fisi alikuja mbio sungura mjanja alisimama mbele ya fisi akamwambia kuwa usijaribu kumshika mbuzi kisha akamfunga mbuzi kwa mlango aliyokuwepo

Original: mumera kange nangwa lucy wa wesonga
Translation: jina langu ni lucy wesonga

Original: esie ndi omumarachi handi wefu hulivamarachi
Translation: mimi ni mumarachi na kwetu ni wamarachi

Original: haandi esie ndajama olumarachi
Translation: tena mimi napenda kimarachi

Original: isababu yakira ndamanya olumarachi ni huvera mamuange yarula ovuwanga ni yetha hudeha ovumarachi sikira babuange ni mumarachi sikira esie ndi mumarachi
Translation: sababu iliyofanya nikajua kimarachi ni kuwa mamangu alitoka buwanga akaja kuoleka kwa wamarachi kwa sababu babangu ni mumarachi na ndio maana mimi ni mumarachi

Original: handi mukofu wange niwakira nindibulwa obumarachi huluohuba mukofu wange abulanga ohumteshia kuhu wanje babuange siyahebulwe dawe
Translation: tena babu yangu ndiye aliyefanya nizaliwe kwa wamarachi kwa sababu angekosa kumwoa nyanya yangu babangu hangezaliwa

Original: handi hulwefu babuange ama mamuange mulala wabu afwa esie sindahebulwe omuluhya dawe
Translation: na kikwetu babangu ama mamangu mmoja wao angekufa singezaliwa mluhya

Original: efwe huli nende vindu vingi lakini evilindwa ni kama thingombe nende thimbusi nende thingokho nende ifamilia yathio

Translation: mimi ni mzawa wa marachi na tena ni lugha yetu kama wamarachi

Translation: huko watu huongea kimarachi tena kimarachi kilicho na vitu vingi

Translation: tunavyovizungumza ukienda kanisani kuna sala zinazosemwa kwa lugha ya kimarachi

Original: inyanga eyo ndaathia mkanisa na mkanisa ndalola vandu ni valama thisala
Translation: siku hiyo nilienda kanisani na kanisani naona watu wakiomba sala

Translation: watu wengi huomba kwa kimarachi

Original: olumarachi ni lugha lwefu
Translation: kimarachi ni lugha yetu

Original: olumarachi ni lulai mno khaandi hwakhaluhaye tawe huvera ni lugha lwefu lwahwanala
Translation: kimarachi ni kizuri sana tena hatutakikataa kwa sababu ni lugha yetu tuliyoizozea

Original: mulukongo lwefu vario vandu vakhongo ata chief wohulukongo yesi alomalomanga lumarachi niye yelolanga omumarachi
Translation: kijijini mwetu kuna watu wakubwa ata chifu wa kijiji pia huzungumza kimarachi na hujiona mumarachi

Original: vakuka vefu vahare vosi vamanya hulomaloma lumarachi kamili khaandi lumarachi lurimo vindu vingi vya vandu hulomalomanga
Translation: mababu zetu wa kitambo pia wanajua kuzungumza kimarachi kamili tena kimarachi kina vitu vingi ambavyo watu huzungumza

Original: niwenya mapesa mulumarachi babolanga mbu amatongolo

Original: khaandi niwenya hulanga ati kumi na mbili mlumarachi valanganga mbu ehumi na tsiviri
Translation: na ukitaka kuita kumi na mbili kwa kimarachi huitwa ati ehumi na tsiviri

Original: handi niwenya hulanga sitavyo vakuka vefu valaanganga lukaratasi

Original: niwenya hulanga lubeseni mulumarachi kamili valanganga lwesingiro

Original: niwenya hulanga sibuyu mlumarachi kamili valanga mbu sikube

Original: olo nilwo lumarachi kamili
Translation: hicho ndicho kimarachi kamili

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: ingombe ni isolo indayi muno ingombe ino noorairisia siyakhakhomera dawe isolo ino okhoyere khuiba biakhulia nga bunyasi lusi milabi masakara ka madimwa nende busie bwa madimwa khandi ingombe okhoyere oiberesia amatsi malafu akalimo itsumbi

Original: ingombe niindayi mubulamu bwa mundu ingombe niwiinya ikhule bilayi nooyumbakhira inyumba yayo eilwangwa mbari siduoli sisduoli esio siinyikhana sibe silafu lukari khandi siinyikhana babukulange bilayi khandi ingombe yenyekhana isingwe bilayi bulinyanga ingombe eyo iri nende tsifaida tsiayo iruberesianga inyama eya baandu bakusianga mubutsa khandi iruberesianga mabeere nende inyama imbolera eya tsingombe khuretsanga mumadimwa kefu amasingo ka ingombe koosi karukhonyanga khuumbakha tsinyumba tsia bunyasi
Translation: ngombe ni mzuri kwa maisha ya mtu ngombe ukitaka akuwe vizuri unamjengea nyumba yake ambayo inaitwa zizi hiyo inatakikana iwe safi sana tena inatakikana tena inatakikana ichukuliwe vizuri tena ngombe anafaa aogeshwe vizuri kila siku ngombe huyo anafaida zake hutupea nyama ambayo watu huuza kwenye duka la kuuzia nyama tena hutupea maziwa na nyama mbolea ya ngombe tunaweka kwa mahindi yetu zamadi ya ngombe pia hutusaidia kujenga nyumba za nyasi

Original: obulayi bwa ingombe ni khuruberesia
Translation: uzuri wa ngombe ni kupeana

Original: ingokho
Translation: kuku

Original: esie ndajama ingokho khubeera imberesianga amatsi malayi mudala ingokho inyala khukhuberesia ebiindu bingi ebia weenya ingokho yeene ibulanga makhua mangi esie nggandola ewe nga muruki onyala wanyola inganga ikhongo khurulana nende ingokho
Translation: mimi napenda kuku kwa sababu ananipea maji mzuri nyumbani kuku anaweza kukupea vitu vingi unavyovitaka kuku mwenyewe hana maneno mengi mimi ninavyo ona wewe kama mfugaji unaeza pata faida kubwa kutokana na kuku

Original: esikera niimbola mbari ingokho iruberesianga ebiindu bingi ni khubeera ingokho ngairi awo inyala khukhuberesia mabuyu aka khumekera obusuma khandi onyala khukusia amabuyu ako khandi onyala khukusia ingokho yene mana waria esiindu sinulu

Original: sindu sianyala khuboola sibi khuingokho ni inyala khubotsa ebiakhuria bingi nikari mbu ori khuumbakha
Translation: kitu ninachoweza kusema kibaya kwa kuku ni kuwa anaweza kula vyakula vingi ukiwa kwenye gumzo

Original: abaandu bangi bajama tsingokho khubeera niwakhanyola bakeni onyala khubukula ingokho yawo eyyendio noosinjira abakeni bao abo khandi noodekha ingokho khasiibukula ebikha birambi dawe kata mukeni wao naari luangu anyala say aria obusuma buawo etsingokho netsilai abaandu baruke tsingokho
Translation: watu wengi wanapenda kuku kwa sababu ukipata wageni unaweza chukua kuku wako huyo na umchinjie wageni wako hao tena ukipika kuku haichukui muda mrefu kamwe hata mgeni wako akiwa haraka anaweza tu kula ugali wako kuku ni wazuri watu wafuge kuku

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: ingombe ni siruke omundu yajama ingombe khuluobera ingombe iri nende tsifaida tsisaabi tsifaida tsino ni amabeere inyama nende amasingo
Translation: ngombe ni mfugo mtu anampenda ngombe kwa kuwa ngombe anafaida nyingi sana faida hizi ni maziwa nyama na mazamadi

Original: esiye ndajama ingombe khuluobera iruberesianga ebiakhuria ingombe niibula imberetsianga mabeere ngoobanga mabeere khukusia khusiro niinyola matongolo
Translation: mimi napenda ngombe kwa maana hutupea chakula ngombe akijifungua hutupa maziwa huwa napeleka maziwa kuuza sokoni naninapata pesa

Original: wamanyakho mbu mabanga kaingombe ni musala okua khusirikha noori muluare nootsa khukusia olanyola mapesa amangi
Translation: unajua kwamba damu ya ngombe ni dawa ya kutibu ukiwa mgonjwa ukienda kuuza unapata pesa mingi

Original: inyama ya ingombe niindayi lukari iri nende esiuuya
Translation: zamadi ya ngombe ni mbolea mbolea hutusaidia kupanda mahindi na maharagwe nyama ya ngombe nitamu sana ina ladha

Original: erisero ria ingombe khare bakofu bakaasianga tsingubo tsia khufuala nende abaafundi bakasianga ebilaaro bia maasai notsia mudala mwa mundu olanyola tsingombe nitsiaya
Translation: ngozi ya ngombe kitambo wazee walikuwa wanatengeneza nguo za kuvaa na fundi walikuwa wanatengeneza viatu za maasai ukienda kwa boma ya mtu utapata ngombe wakichunga

Original: ingombe ni isolo indai nibilai omundu nairuka
Translation: ngombe ni mnyama mzuri ni vizuri mtu akimfuga

Original: bulayi bwa ingombe
Translation: umuhimu wa ngombe

Original: ingombe ni isolo ya bandu baruka mudala khuri nende tsingombr tsibiri eya mabeere nende eya inyama mundu ula owakhera khurima anyala yaruka eya yenya muene igombe iri nende birenge bine tsinjika nende ebindu bindi sirenge sia ingombe siri nende sirekei ingombe yosi iri nende mukhira
Translation: ngombe ni mnyama ambaye watu waliguga nyumbani tuna ngombe wawili ya maziwa nay nyama mtu yule ambaye anapenda kulima anaweza fuga yule ambaye anataka mwenyewe ngombe ana miguu minne pembe na vitu vingine mguu wa ngombe una kwato ngombe pia ana mkia

Original: ingombe iri nende bulayi busabi mubulamu obua abaandu inyala khuinia amabeere mangi lukari mabere ako kanyala khukhonya abaandu khukusia banyola amapesa bakula sindu sia beenya mabere ako khandi kanyala kakhonya omwana mudidi ngina naabulao anyala yangua mana yarekha khurira mabeere ako kosi kakhonya khuba nende ameno malayi akari nende maani
Translation: ngombe ana umuhimu mwingi kwa maisha ya watu anaweza kutoa maziwa mengi sana maziwa hayo yanaweza kusaidia watu kuuza kuoata pesa kununua kitu ambacho wanataka maziwa hayo pia yanaweza kumsaidia mtoto mdogo mamake akiwa hayupo anaweza kunywa kisha akaacha kulia maziwa hayo pia husaidia kuwa na meno mzuri ambayo yana nguvu

Original: ingombe khandi inyala khuinia inyama abaandu beekhonyera nga eriani inyama eya ingombe inyala yakusibua yarera tsisende
Translation: ngombe tena anaweza toa nyama watu wakatumia kama mboga nyama ya ngombe inaweza uzwa ikaleta pesa

Original: tsingombe tsindi tsinyala khurima tsindalo ingombe inyala yakhuesa mukokoteni ingombe iri nende bukhonyi bukhongo khu baandu ndajama ingombe lukari
Translation: ngombe wengine wanaweza kulima shamba ngombe anaweza vuta mkokoteni ngombe ana usaidizi mkubwa kwa watu napenda ngombe sana

Original: onyala wakula esindi ewe muene bila khukhonyua nende mundu yesi yesi omundu yayinia amakhua mbari esiri ambi nisio sikhukhonya khasiyaboola bubatsa tawe
Translation: unaweza nunua kitu wewe mwenyewe bila kusaidiwa na mtu yeyote mtu alitoa maneno kuwa kilicho karibu ndicho kinachokusaidia kumbe hakusema uongo

Original: ingombe onyala khuisinja nikari mbari ori nende abakeni ni obula amapesa aka khukula eriani ama noori nende amasika onyala waisinja nookarisiria abakeni bao ebiakhuria ingombe ni indayi khubulamu bua abaandu
Translation: unaweza mchinja ukiwa na wageni wageni kama hauna pesa ya kununua mboga ama ukiwa na matanga unaweza chunjana unatengenezea wageni wako chakula ngombe ni muhimu kwa maisha ya mtu

Original: olukano
Translation: hadithi

Original: khamuna nende omshiere
Translation: kidiri na bikizee

Original: omushiere yali natsire mjokoni okhufuka obusuma bwae yali namarire nabulere mnzu khongo nabukula inyeni nachaka okhudekha

Translation: alikuwa pekee yake katika boma lake amechukua sima lake na samaki akaanza kula akiwa amekiti chini ya mti

Translation: baada ya dakika mbili kupita kidir alichukua sahani ya kwanza kisha bikizee akatokelezea katika chumba chake cha kulala akapata kidiri akila sima

Original: olwa abandu betsa humulola omushiere khamuna nikharula mkari mwa inzu abandu ngabalola khamuna nibalura tsimbiro olukano lwanje lubwelele ao

Original: lukano lwa korona

Original: omwana yeerukha tsimbiro naatsia munyumba naalanga mbari mama itsa ololekho kundu kuemere khu geti aria
Translation: mtoto alikimbia mbio akaenda kwa nyumba akaita eti mama kuja uone kutu kumesima kwa lango kuu

Original: yaangoba mubafu ndeeyoka ndaria
Translation: alinipeleka kwa bafu nikaoga na nikakula

Original: ndamukanira olwa bibere mana naatsaka khuunyimbira tsinyimbo tsia korona mbu khalala khabiri fuala imaski khadaru khane osia mikhono kharano khasasaba mwikhale are saba munane korona ilabua

Original: ifisi yeekhola mbari iri nende maani ojolijoli khasuda ambi nende omuriango alafu khabukula ichupa sia amabaanga alafu nikhakhuya ifisi khumurue ni khabola mbari obuongo bubuo burula khandi siabukula ichupa ya mabanga ni khandi khamukhuya khumurwe ifisi yeerukha yarekha imbusi mudala
Translation: fisi alijifanya kuwa ananguvu sungura mjanja alisonga karibu na mlango halafu akachukua chupa ya damu kisha akampiga fisi kichwani akasema kuwa ubongo wakeunatokatena akachukua chupa ya damu tena akampigakichwani fisi alikimbia akamwacha mbuzi nyumbani

Original: obuo nibuo bulayi bwa ojolijoli
Translation: ndio uzuri wa sungura mjanja huo

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Translation: ngombe ni mnyama anayefugwa kwa boma ngombe wako wawiliya kizungu ya gredi nay kiafrika ngombe wote wanaofugwa wana uzuri wake

Translation: ngombe akifugwa anastahili kuwa na ulinzi mzuri unafaa uwe na mahali pa kuchunga ngombe panapotoshana na ngombe ulio fuga wote wanafaa wawe na mahali wanapolala zizini

Original: burimundu amanyire mbari ingombe ireranga amabeere inyama nende amapesa kanyala khukhonya

Translation: ngombe hufanya watalii kutoka nchi zingine wakija kututembelea kuona ngombe wageni hao hutoka nchi za mbali kama uganda tanzania na rwanda

Translation: ngombe hawa huleta mbolea zamadi yao huokotwa yakiwekwa pamoja kutengeneza mbolea na kila mtu anajua uzuri wa mbolea ngombe unaamuka asubuhi na unapeleka malishoni

Original: mwenye dala sangala kho abakeni basangale
Translation: mwenye boma furahi ndipo wageni wafurahi

Original: indede wefwe sangala kho abakeni basangale
Translation: indede wetu furahi ndipo wageni wafurahi

Original: indede eeh indede mama indede eeeh
Translation: indede eeh indede mama indede eeeh

Original: indede balole abana baeresiekho siria sia onyorere
Translation: indede waone watoto wasaidie na kile ambacho umepata

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: ingombe ni isolo eya babdu barukanga khuri nende tsingombe tsia aina tsibiri khuri nende ingombe ikhueberesianga amabeere ni khuri nende eikhuberesianga enyama
Translation: ngombe ni mnyama ambaye watu walifuga tuna ngombe wa aina mbili tunangombe ambao hutupa maziwa na tuna ile ambayo hutupa nyama

Original: niimaririsia ndakha khubola rikhua riange noori nende ingombe mudala orakosa khuiberesia ebiakhuria nende matsi nooruka ingombe soolasanda khaba mundu yajama ingombe khuluobera ni indayi

Original: syaliwo omukhana yali yadekha mumanani mani mukhana wavu yathia khumukendera omusathawavu amuakiha khunungo lano okunani kwitha omusatha wavu oyo achaka huvola arufu ingeni iunya alafu achaka huimba ati sinandi lusu lukeni luunya ano dwanyi ludekere khurera

Original: omukhana uno yathia khusolosia avasie alafu omukhana uno yaavukula mwana alafu ahepa ni avirire thingira thyomukarikari vaali veenya khulia omwana waye
Translation: msichana huyu akaenda kuwahamasisha wenzake alafu msichana akachukua huyo mtoto wakahepa na kupitia njia nyingine kumtorosha mtoto wake

Original: syaliwo omukhana waathia okhunava nende vaasie thingeni alafu vachake lukendo ne omukhana mulala yavoola yeevirire isimbi vakeni voola alafu vaasie vamkania alekhane nayio alafu akaluha khumwalo nianyola kunani kuosi kunaava kuvukule isimbi kurere mundoh ngayola ni anyola nikwikarire maathi ni kumala kumuvukula kumwingisia mundoh ni kuchaka hukuda isimbi nikumvorera solomalomakho huavwao alafu omukhana yathia khulira ati kuno kuyenderesia kwanje ninthia ohunava okwandilivolera mwene mbukule
Translation: kulikuwa na msichana aliyeenda kuvua na wenzake samaki alafu wakaanza safari na msichana mmoja akasema amesahau ndoano wageni wakafika kisha wenzake wakamkataza awachane nao akarudi mtoni akapata nyani pia anavua na amechukua ndoano ameeka kwa ndoo na alipofika akapata amezuia maji na nyani huyo akamwingiza kwa ndoo na akaanza kugonga ndoano akimwambia asiongee na tukaenda alafu msichana akaenda kulia ati huyo amemwogofya akienda kuvua nitakayemwambia mwenyewe nimechukua

Original: sngayoola mudala naanyola mundu kata naumao huluokhuva yeenya wayakharuma athie amwendere maathi kohunywa siyanyoola dawe

Original: yachaka khulanga mwana waye khane kunani kwari kumarire khumwiva mani kwatsia kwamukisa msino kutsie kumurie baadaye
Translation: alianza kuita mtoto wake kumbe nyani alikwa ashamuiba na akaenda kumficha kichakani aende amle baadaye

Original: skhuula awendio imbakha yange ibwere
Translation: kufikia hapo hadithi yangu imeisha

Original: abamenyi ba kenya basiange esinyenya mukhole ni muruke tsingombe mubungi nimukhola murio mulaba muekhonyere lukari mu bulamu buenyu bwa imberi ni mulabola mbari ndabakhonya ni mwakhakanyirenge abaana benu
Translation: wakenya wenzangu mimi ninachotaka mfanye ni mfuge ngombe kwa wingi mkifanya hivyo mtakuwa mmejisaidia sana kwa maisha yenu ya mbeleni na mtasema niliwasaidia mtakuwa mkiwaambia watoto wenyu

Original: nisiamaririsia ingombe ni siruke siri nende ikhabi lukari mubulamu bua mundu
Translation: kabla sijamaliza ngombe ni mfugo ambaye ana baraka kubwa kwa maisha ya mtu

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: ingombe ni eisolo eyikhonyanga abandu khunyua amabeere ni abandu bakhomera lukari noorisia ingombe bilayi niirusia amabeere malayi abaandu bangi bajama ingombe khuluakhubera ya amabeere ako akabetsanga malayi khubulamu bua omuundu khandi ingombe okhoyekhane oiberesie amatsiuri
Translation: ngombe ni mnyama anayesaidia watu kunywa maziwa na watu wana nenepa sana ukimlisha ngombe vizuri anatoa maziwa mazwatu wengi wanapenda ngombe kwa sababu ya maziwa hayo ambayo huwa mazurikwa maisha ya mtu tena ngombe anafaa apewe maji

Original: omwana owa imbusi niyeembuluwa yesi akeranga abandu banyua amabeere aka imbusi imbusi yoosi iberesiananga mabeere nga ingombe amabeere ako kakhonyanga nundu khunyola tsisende naamala khukakusia imbusi yoosi okhoyikhane oiberesie amatsi malayi aka khunyua khu ibe nende obulamu bulayi
Translation: kimeme akizaliwa yeye pia hufanya watu wanywe maziwa ya mbuzi mbuzi pia hupeana maziwa kama ngombe maziwa hayo humsaidia mtu kupata pesa baada ya kuyauza nbuzi pia unastahili kumpa maji mazuri ya kunywa ili awe na afya bora

Original: erikondi riosi riri nende bulayi buario busabi noolikusia noonyola amapesa masabi
Translation: kondoo pia uzuri wake kubwa ukimuuza unapata pesa mingi

Original: obulwaye bwa korona
Translation: ugonjwa wa korona

Original: omwaka kwa elfu tsibiri nende kumi na tisa obulwaye bwa korona bwetsa musyalo siefwe okhurula mu shibala shia tsina
Translation: mwaka wa elfu mbili na kumi na tisa ugonjwa wa korona ulikuja kwa dunia kutoka nchi ya china

Original: mana fuesi basomi nikhurula mubikuli khwakalukha mudala
Translation: pia sisi wanafunzi tulitoka shule tukarudi nyumbani

Original: obulwaye buno bwatsaka khwira abandu bangi mutsina mana nibeerukha abandi nibeetsa mukenya okhunyola amaresi
Translation: ugonjwa huu ulianza kuwaua watu wengi nchini china na wengine wakakimbilia nchini kenya kutafuta matibabu

Original: omukhana mulala khurula tsina yeetsa musyalo sya kenya nende obulwaye buno
Translation: msichana mmoja kutoka china alikuja nchini kenya na huu ugonjwa

Original: omuruki uhuru kenyatta yetsurisia abandu beefwale tsimaski abeekhale are nende abandu bandi basaabe amakhono buri sikha beekhale mumadala kaabu nende khufunga tsikanisa khulwa sikha ili khupungusya obulwaye buno

Original: ingombe neindai lukari

Original: ingombe

Original: olukano lwange lwahavwera ao
Translation: usimulizi wangu umeishia hapo

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: ni sindu sia maana mumadala kefu ingombe inyala khukhuberesia amabeere ni khandi onyala hunyola amapesa khululana nende tsingombe ingombe niindayi lukari niiri mudala

Original: ifisi nende sionya siavukula nisiefunda lulala

Original: riathia nirianda husiporokodio nisifwa
Translation: jiwe lilikwama kwa koo yake na akafariki

Original: ingombe
Translation: ngombe

Original: ingombe ni sindu siri nende malayi masabi khu muundu ingombe iri nende bulayi nende bumaanu buayo mudala ingombe bandu baijama lukari sakira bairukanga mudala

Original: ingokho
